00018 #ifndef __Current_Input__
00019 #define __Current_Input__
00020 
00021 #include "math_util.h"
00022 #include <vector>
00023 
00024 #include "BaseInput.h"
00025 
00026 class segment
00027 {
00028 public:
00029         int number;
00030         int tag;
00031         nec_float x,y,z;
00032         nec_float length;
00033 
00034         nec_complex current;
00035 
00036         // Read the segment data from a NEC-2 output file
00037         segment(istream& in_stream)
00038         {
00039         }
00040 };
00041 
00042 class CurrentInput : public BaseInput
00043 {
00044 public: 
00045         vector<segment> segments;
00046 
00047         long n_items;
00048         
00049         CurrentInput(istream& in_stream)
00050         {
00051                 n_items = 0;
00052                 
00053                 string searchString("CURRENTS AND LOCATION");
00054                 while (in_stream.good())
00055                 {
00056                         string line = readline(in_stream);
00057         
00058                         if (line.find(searchString,0) != string::npos)
00059                         {
00060                                 
00061                                 while (line.find("PHASE",0) == string::npos)
00062                                         line = readline(in_stream);
00063         
00064                                 line = readline(in_stream);
00065                                 
00066                                 while (line != "")
00067                                 {
00068                                         stringstream ss(line);
00069                                 
00070                                         segment s(ss);
00071                                         segments.push_back(s);
00072         
00073                                         line = readline(in_stream);                             
00074                                         n_items++;
00075                                 }
00076                                 cout << "Currents and Location: " << n_items << " lines" << endl;
00077                         }       
00078                 }
00079         }
00080 
00081         bool equalto(const CurrentInput& ai)
00082         {
00083                 if (difference(ai) > 1e-5)
00084                         return false;
00085 
00086                 return true;
00087         }
00088 
00089         nec_float difference(const CurrentInput& ai)
00090         {
00091                 nec_float ret = 0.0;
00092                 
00093                 if (n_items != ai.n_items)
00094                         return 1;
00095                 
00096                 for (long i=0; i < n_items;i++)
00097                 {
00098                         try
00099                         {
00100                                 ret += segments[i].diff(ai.segments[i]);
00101                         }
00102                         catch (string message)
00103                         {
00104                                 cout << "Diff at segment [" << i << "] : " << message << endl;
00105                         }
00106                 }
00107                 return  ret;
00108         };
00109 };
00110 
00111 #endif /* __Current_Input__ */
